LanguageData.MiscTraining_CombatTraining.description: Work out. Train those muscles and your melee stat.
LanguageData.MiscTraining_CombatTraining.label: working out
LanguageData.WeightBench.label: weight bench
LanguageData.WeightBench.description: The weight bench is a place where you can train your muscles.
LanguageData.Barbell.label: barbell
LanguageData.Barbell.description: A barbell for strength training exercises.
LanguageData.PullupBars.label: pull up bars
LanguageData.PullupBars.description: Used for performing upper body exercises such as pull-ups and chin-ups to strengthen the back, arms, and core muscles.
LanguageData.BalanceBeam.label: balance beam
LanguageData.BalanceBeam.description: A narrow beam is with a long padded surface for athletes to perform balance and precision routines.
LanguageData.SpinningDummy.label: spinning dummy
LanguageData.SpinningDummy.description: A spinning dummy used in martial arts and combat sports for striking and grappling practice.
LanguageData.Rack.label: weight rack
LanguageData.Rack.description: A weight rack designed to organize and store weights, ensuring easy access and a clutter-free workout area.
LanguageData.Treadmill.label: treadmill
LanguageData.Treadmill.description: A indoor treadmill for cardiovascular fitness.
LanguageData.ExerciseBike.label: exercise bike
LanguageData.ExerciseBike.description: A stationary fitness machine resembling a bicycle, used for cardiovascular workouts by pedaling against resistance levels.
LanguageData.Dumbbells.label: dumbbells
LanguageData.Dumbbells.description: Free weights for a variety of exercises targeting different muscle groups.
LanguageData.JumpRope.label: jump rope
LanguageData.JumpRope.description: A jump rope for cardiovascular workouts and coordination training through rhythmic jumping.
LanguageData.Kettlebell.label: kettlebell
LanguageData.Kettlebell.description: A a cast-iron weight with a handle, used for dynamic strength and endurance exercises.
LanguageData.HandGrip.label: hand grips
LanguageData.HandGrip.description: Portable exercise tools designed to strengthen the muscles in the hands, wrists, and forearms.
LanguageData.YogaBall.label: exercise ball
LanguageData.YogaBall.description: An inflatable, resilient ball used for yoga and fitness exercises to improve balance, core strength, and flexibility.
LanguageData.Gaming_WorkingOut.label: exercise
LanguageData.Estate_RoomRequirementAllRoyalChandelier: all royal chandeliers must be lit
